description: A Flutter widget defining a registration screen with form validation, input controls, and UI elements for user registration within a mobile application.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Public widget class representing the registration screen which is a stateful widget.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form state, input controllers, validation, and UI rendering.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the RegisterScreen widget.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _validateName
methods.description: Validates the name input to ensure it is not empty.

methods.name: _validateEmail
methods.description: Validates the email input to ensure it is not empty and contains '@'.

methods.name: _validatePassword
methods.description: Validates the password input to ensure it is at least 6 characters.

methods.name: _validateConfirm
methods.description: Validates that the confirmation password matches the primary password.
